title: Pookie Believes in Santa Claus
description: Christmas is coming to Bluebell Wood, but Pookie is worried Â‹ is there really a Santa Claus? Even Belinda and the woodland folk are not sure. Always eager to discover the truth, Pookie decides to find out for himself. Waiting up late that Christmas Eve, Pookie and his friends are treated to a wonderful surprise!
author: Ivy L. Wallace
